SHR Reference Model Version 1.0.0
shr.medication

Element Dosage

Documentation:
The dosage of the medication, prescribed or taken.
Ancestors:
  • Dosage
Used By:
  • ContraceptiveAction, 
  • ContraceptiveMethodRequested, 
  • ContraceptiveMethodRequestedAgainst, 
  • MedicationAction, 
  • MedicationDispenseAction, 
  • MedicationDispensed, 
  • MedicationNotDispensed, 
  • MedicationNotRequested, 
  • MedicationNotUsed, 
  • MedicationRequested, 
  • MedicationUsed
